channel.title: Should moparisthebest.com have a general discussion?
channel.description:
Mods if this is unexeptable please take it down. I have no were else to post.
Well seeing as how moparisthebest.org has a general discussion were you cant talk about private servers only other stuff.. so i think we should have one here, a moparisthebest.com general discussion, just like moparisthebest.org but ALLOWED to talk about servers. All we have is sections were we cant post anything but questions or tuts.

item.title: Should moparisthebest.com have a general discussion?
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

Frell:

I Metal I, how did you get moderated?

for arguing with javaTM and mod robby and hippyys because they were putting me down

Read full topic

item.title: Should moparisthebest.com have a general discussion?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Frell:

that does make a point… But moparisthebest is for learning purposes and it has general discussion. Everyone on moparisthebest thinks moparscape is a craphole. So we should keep our communitee’s seperate.

Its as simple as, if you want to post something that you think belongs in general discussion, the go over to moparisthebest.

Read full topic

item.title: Should moparisthebest.com have a general discussion?
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

Getting rid of the server advertizement section will cut down on the site population and increase in spam for people wanting to advertize there server… i mean why would people code a server if no one could join it… or you couldent advertize it

item.title: Should moparisthebest.com have a general discussion?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

But with the spam amount, we will have a chance to find out who should and shouldnt be here, And maybe rid the forums of the ones that are here for “fun” aka the server advertizement section.

Read full topic

item.title: Should moparisthebest.com have a general discussion?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Yupe, i mean how amny times have you seen (and will probly be posted here)
“whats this have to do with private servers?”
“Post this on moparisthebest” - We kinda CANT…

and this is kinda why we need a question section, this quote doesnt really mainly have to do with servers but its a good question

[quote=“Owner Reaper, post:1, topic:95333”]I CANT FIND THE ANSWER FOR: What’s the call statement of a method to stop a running Thread?

.<

any clues or tips??[/quote]

Do you guys see the point im trying to make?

Read full topic
